en.description: Facilitates long-distance communication between robotics deployed in the aqua systems. It can be found in the ponds around Venus.

ru.description: Упрощает дальнюю связь между роботизированными водными единицами. Может быть найден в прудах Венеры.

ko.description: Facilitates long-distance communication between robotics deployed in the aqua systems. It can be found in the ponds around Venus.
